name: Dungeon of cards
description:
Enter the dungeon of cards and go through many dangerous darkest places where everyone wants to kill you.

How to play: Open cards, collect and fight. Pass through as many levels as you can.

Items description:

Magnifier - allows to see through the card to avoid mobs.

Weapons - as usual, used for killing bad guys(mobs)

Heal potions - heal yourself a little

Coin - coin

Bomb - is a subtype of a weapon, with it you can destroy even walls

Backpack - gives you more space in your inventory

Shield - protect yourself

Spells - fire - burns the enemy, ice - freezes it
